attributes.action: Investigate Diamond Bus NW (Rotala) and their ability to run a reliable service.
attributes.additional_details: Buses in Greater Manchester are one of the main modes of transport that the public use. It is especially vital for people in Bury and Oldham who do not have local railway stations. We should not have to constantly suffer from delayed and cancelled buses, unfriendly drivers, filthy buses and routes being withdrawn. The people of Greater Manchester are fed up with the bus service that Diamond Bus run within our county.
attributes.background: Since Rotala purchased the First Manchester routes, the public of Greater Manchester have suffered from a appalling bus service with unreliable buses and unfriendly staff. This petition aims for a review of the company and their ability to run a reliable service.

rejection.details:
We can't accept your petition because the UK Government and Parliament aren't responsible for the issue you raise. Bus services in Manchester are the responsibility of your local council.

You could raise the issue with local councillors who represent you. You can find your local councillors here:

https://www.gov.uk/find-your-local-councillors

You can also petition your local council - you can find out more here: 

https://secure.manchester.gov.uk/info/10095/petitions/4759/create_an_e-petition/3

There are currently proposals to bring bus franchising under the control of the Greater Manchester Combined Authority. You can read about the proposals and consultation here: https://www.greatermanchester-ca.gov.uk/what-we-do/transport/
